name: Munchimalz_SIAGameJam2021
description:
SIA Game Jam 2021: Creators: Nicole, Bella, Ceyda

NICOLE: @ceryneia https://ceryneia.itch.io/

BELLA: @Bella_SIA https://itch.io/profile/bella-sia

Game Objective: You are a waitress/waiter at Munchimalz. Visit each customer (by colliding into them) to allow for various illusions to display. Once the illusion displays, select whichever animal you see in the illusion; you will receive your tip accordingly. You get higher tips if you choose the animal that the customer would prefer in real life. You can keep track of the time left and how many tips you've collected in the information panel. 

Controls: A, W, S, D (control player) 

How do you get promoted by the boss/win? You receive tips equal to or greater than $15. 

How do you get fired/lose? You receive tips equal to or less than $14.

Credits: 

Background Music: "Shop Jazz" by Migfus20 https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/559850/

Cha Ching Sound: "Cha Ching" by angelak_m  https://freesound.org/people/angelak_m/sounds/132169/

GameEnd Music:  "Guitar Abstract Melody" by kaponja  https://freesound.org/people/kaponja/sounds/54212/

Waitress/Waiter: softGachaBase by esantiag https://www.pixilart.com/art/soft-gacha-base-2d2894da202181c

Illusion Concepts:

"Rabbit-duck Illusion" by Jospeh Jastrow

"Penguin-giraffe Illusion" by Jeep 

"Elephant-snake Illusion" by Buenos Aires Zoo

"Pig-owl Illusion" by https://earthlymission.com/amazing-upside-down-animal-illusions/
